# Test for calling Go from R
## Commile and build

```
$ go build -o libcalc.so -buildmode=c-shared ./calc
$ R CMD SHLIB -L. -lcalc rgo.c
```

## How to use
```{r}
# Load shared object
dyn.load("rgo.so")

# Call a function via C
.Call("godouble", 21L)

.Call("gofib", 40L)
```
